overview: They are tired of their boring jobs... but do they have what it takes to make the big-time? You betcha... and they are huge! Meet the heavy-hootered honeys who'll do anything to get into show business. When some Vegas producers hold auditions for a glitzy revue, these mammoth mammaried sex-machines show up for action! Soon, big-titted Trinity Loren takes on two randy cocksmen in hopes of being chosen. It's BRIGHT LIGHTS, BIG TITTIES and all out sexual warfare! May the best bust win!
title: Bright Lights, Big Titties
